trans-unit.source: Visual indicator showing the exception status of an order

seg-source.mrk: Visual indicator showing the exception status of an order

target.mrk: 顯示訂單異常狀態的視覺指示

trans-unit.source: This column provides a visual indication of the exception status of an order. The field can show one of three icons, denoting a red or yellow warning status, or green when no threshold has been reached. You can define the threshold and basis criterion for each status.

seg-source.mrk: This column provides a visual indication of the exception status of an order.
The field can show one of three icons, denoting a red or yellow warning status, or green when no threshold has been reached.
You can define the threshold and basis criterion for each status.

target.mrk: 此欄提供訂單異常狀態的視覺指示之用。
欄位中可顯示三個圖示之中的一個，表示其為紅色或黃色警告狀態，或在尚未到達門檻時以綠色顯示。
您可為各個狀態定義門檻和基礎準則。

trans-unit.source: In your user settings, choose <uicontrol>Application Configuration -> Define Exception Rules</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: In your user settings, choose <uicontrol>Application Configuration -> Define Exception Rules</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 在使用者設定中，選擇 <uicontrol>[應用程式組態 -> 定義異常規則]</uicontrol>。

trans-unit.source: In the <uicontrol>Rule Basis</uicontrol> field, choose the criterion for the rule, and whether it is triggered by a percentage value, an absolute value, or both.

seg-source.mrk: In the <uicontrol>Rule Basis</uicontrol> field, choose the criterion for the rule, and whether it is triggered by a percentage value, an absolute value, or both.

target.mrk: 在 <uicontrol>[規則基礎]</uicontrol> 欄位中，選擇規則準則，以及是否由百分比值、絕對值驅動，亦或兩者皆可。

trans-unit.source: Define the absolute or percentage thresholds for your rule and save your settings.

seg-source.mrk: Define the absolute or percentage thresholds for your rule and save your settings.

target.mrk: 為您的規則定義絕對或百分比門檻，並儲存設定。

trans-unit.source: You enter 20% in the <uicontrol>Threshold Red</uicontrol> field, and 10% in the <uicontrol>Threshold Yellow</uicontrol> field.

seg-source.mrk: You enter 20% in the <uicontrol>Threshold Red</uicontrol> field, and 10% in the <uicontrol>Threshold Yellow</uicontrol> field.

target.mrk: 在 <uicontrol>[紅色門檻]</uicontrol> 欄位中輸入 20％，並在 <uicontrol>[黃色門檻]</uicontrol> 欄位中輸入 10％。

trans-unit.source: The system sets a green indicator for orders and hierarchy nodes whose variances are less than 10%.

seg-source.mrk: The system sets a green indicator for orders and hierarchy nodes whose variances are less than 10%.

target.mrk: 系統會針對差異小於 10％ 的訂單和階層節點，設定綠色指示碼。

trans-unit.source: The system sets a yellow indicator for orders and hierarchy nodes whose variances are between 10% and 20%.

seg-source.mrk: The system sets a yellow indicator for orders and hierarchy nodes whose variances are between 10% and 20%.

target.mrk: 針對差異介於 10％ 和 20％ 之間的訂單和階層節點，設定黃色指示碼。

trans-unit.source: The system sets a red indicator for orders and hierarchy nodes whose variances are more than 20%.

seg-source.mrk: The system sets a red indicator for orders and hierarchy nodes whose variances are more than 20%.

target.mrk: 差異大於 20％ 的訂單和階層節點，系統將設定紅色指示碼。
